snippet.title: The Elision Effect - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2621420/The_Elision_Effect/
Release 31.05.2024

itch.io:
https://pizzapranks.itch.io/indiepocalypse-44

The Elision Effect is a short surreal puzzle game.
featured in indiepocalypse zine.

---

based on the 2020 Map Labs entry
(in)stabilitea for Back on Track.

music by @AkAveryM 

---
 
Indie game, Atmospheric, First-Person, Liminal space, Pixel Art, Retro, Surreal, Walking simulator, weird, eerie, weircore
